clues.text: "The Eagle Has Flown" was Jack Higgins' 1991 follow-up to this novel

Published in 1996, "The Flaming Corsage" is the latest in his Albany cycle

He was the only 20th century president who didn't attend formal college

rounds.text: In 1945 Africa had only 4 independent countries; these 2 started with the same first letter
